title: Dragonborn
content: Dragonborn: Fire (DEX save) Bronze Dragonborn: Lightning (DEX save) Copper Dragonborn: Acid (DEX save) Gold Dragonborn: Fire (DEX save) Green Dragonborn: Poison (CON save) Red Dragonborn: Fire (DEX save) Silver Dragonborn: Cold (CON save) White Dragonborn: Cold (CON save) Breath Weapon: You can use your action to exhale destructive energy. It deals damage in an area according to your ancestry. When you use your breath weapon, all creatures in the area must make a saving throw, the type of which
